markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Force Tiles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1006)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 168 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 525 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Light refracts in strange ways through these precisely ground glass tiles, lengthening the refracted force and causing it to push back. Adding this catalyst to a [_wall of force_](/Spells.aspx?ID=363) spell increases the wall's maximum length to 80 feet and maximum height to 40 feet and causes creatures that try to move into the wall's space (or are [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) into the wall) to take 2d6 [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Force Tiles
